Twitter embedded timeline

Questions or comments?

Purpose

Helps with implementing Twitter embedded timelines.

Working example

  • English example
  • French example

How to implement

Coming soon

Configuration options

Coming soon

Events

Event Trigger What it does
wb-init.wb-twitter Triggered manually (e.g., $elm.trigger( "wb-init.wb-twitter" );). Used to manually initialize the Twitter embedded timeline. Note: The Twitter embedded timeline will be initialized automatically unless the required markup is added after the page has already loaded.

Twitter embedded timeline plugin source code on GitHub
